description: how the station was laid out
list of components recorded by the station. Should be a summary of all channels recorded dropped channels will be recorded in Run metadata.
options: [ Ex | Ey | Hx | Hy | Hz | T | Battery | other ]
example: [ Ex, Ey, Hx, Hy, Hz, T]

description: type of data recorded. If multiple types input as a comma separated list
options: [ RMT | AMT | BBMT | LPMT | ULPMT | other ]

description: closest geographic name to the station
station name can be a longer name
